layout.title: Upcoming Events - Timeline Layout
layout.message: Displays list of upcoming events using Timeline layout

state.name: Upcoming Events - Timeline Layout
state.description: Displays list of upcoming events using Timeline layout

field.name: id
field.label: Select Category
field.description: Choose the category which you want to display events

field.name: category_ids
field.label: Categories
field.description: Select categories which you want to display events from. If no categories selected, events from all categories will be displayed

field.name: exclude_category_ids
field.label: Exclude Categories
field.description: Select categories which you want to exclude events from

field.name: location_ids
field.label: Locations
field.description: Select locations which you want to display events from. If no locations selected, events from all locations will be displayed

field.name: city
field.label: City
field.description: Enter a City here and only events from that City will be shown

field.name: hide_children_events
field.label: Hide Children Events
field.description: Choose to show/hide children events for this menu item

field.name: only_show_featured_events
field.label: Only Show Featured Events
field.description: If set to Yes, only featured events will be shown on this module

field.name: display_num
field.label: Number events
field.description: Number of events will be shown on the page

field.name: menu_item_id
field.label: Override Menu Item ID
field.description: If you want the system to use different menu item to generate links from this page, enter ID of that menu item here. In most case, leave it empty

field.name: intro_text
field.label: Intro Text
field.description: If you enter some text here, it will be displayed above list of events
